markdown:
| icon           = poe2_cloak_three_trolls_stitched_icon.png
| description    = This trio of hides still carries the unmistakable stink of trolls. Fluid oozes from the patches of fungus adorning the fibers of the garment and mossy particulates slough off the surface with a touch. The cape retains some of the trolls' regenerative properties. However, much like the trolls, it is highly flammable and vulnerable to corrosive materials.
